Key Match Events: DJ Herz threw five no-hit innings in the first game
Nick Gonzales spoiled the no-hit bid with a two-out single in the bottom of the seventh of the first game
Bryan De La Cruz bounced into a game-ending double play in the bottom of the ninth of the first game
Andres Chaparro hit a two-run homer in the seventh inning of the second game
Aroldis Chapman surrendered a two-out single from James Wood that sparked a four-run rally in the second game
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Pirates entered the seventh inning without a hit in both games
Derek Shelton emphasized the importance of strong bullpen performance
Others: The Pirates lost both games of the doubleheader to the Nationals
Luis Ortiz allowed four runs, three earned, on six hits and a pair of walks over 5 â…” innings in the first game
Mitch Keller allowed just a pair of earned runs on seven hits while striking out eight in the second game
